Course Name: B Tech In Cse
Degree: BTech
Branches: Computer Science, CSE
Duration: 4 years
Seats: 360
Mode: Full Time
Source URL: https://niet.co.in/course/b-tech-in-cse

Placements for B Tech In Cse:
Total Placements Offered: 493
Highest Package: 10 LPA
Average Package: 4.09 LPA

Why choose B Tech In Cse:
PSO1:Identify, analyze real world problems and design their ethical solutions using artificial intelligence, robotics, virtual/augmented reality, data analytics, block chain technology, and cloud computing.

Why choose B Tech In Cse:
PSO2:Design and develop the hardware sensor devices and related interfacing software systems for solving complex engineering problems.

Why choose B Tech In Cse:
PSO3:Understand inter-disciplinary computing techniques and to apply them in the design of advanced computing.

Why choose B Tech In Cse:
PSO4:Conduct investigation of complex problems with the help of technical, managerial, leadership qualities, and modern engineering tools provided by industry-sponsored laboratories.

B Tech In Cse is also known as:
BTech Computer Science CSE
btech computer science cse

Course Name: B Tech In Vlsi
Degree: BTech
Branches: 
Duration: 4 Years
Seats: 60
Mode: Full Time
Source URL: https://niet.co.in/course/b-tech-in-vlsi

Placements for B Tech In Vlsi:
Total Placements Offered: 493
Highest Package: 10 LPA
Average Package: 4.09 LPA

Why choose B Tech In Vlsi:
Engineering Knowledge :Apply the knowledge of mathematics, science, engineering fundamentals, and an engineering specialization to the solution of complex engineering problems.

Why choose B Tech In Vlsi:
Problem Analysis :Identify, formulate, review research literature, and analyze complex engineering problems reaching substantiated conclusions using first principles of mathematics, natural sciences, and engineering sciences.

Why choose B Tech In Vlsi:
Design/Development of Solutions :Design solutions for complex engineering problems and design system components or processes that meet the specified needs with appropriate consideration for the public health and safety, and the cultural, societal, and environmental considerations.

Why choose B Tech In Vlsi:
Conduct Investigations of Complex Problems :Use research-based knowledge and research methods including design of experiments, analysis and interpretation of data, and synthesis of the information to provide valid conclusions.

B Tech In Vlsi is also known as:
BTech 
btech

Course Name: Mathematics And Computing
Degree: 
Branches: 
Duration: 4 years
Seats: 60
Mode: Full Time
Source URL: https://niet.co.in/course/mathematics-and-computing

Placements for Mathematics And Computing:
Total Placements Offered: 493
Highest Package: 10 LPA
Average Package: 4.09 LPA

Why choose Mathematics And Computing:
Engineering Knowledge: Apply knowledge of mathematics, natural science, computing, engineering fundamentals and an engineering specialization as specified in WK1 to WK4 respectively to develop to the solution of complex engineering problems.

Why choose Mathematics And Computing:
Problem Analysis: Identify, formulate, review research literature and analyze complex engineering problems reaching substantiated conclusions with consideration for sustainable development. (WK1 to WK4)

Why choose Mathematics And Computing:
Design/Development of Solutions: Design creative solutions for complex engineering problems and design/develop systems/components/processes to meet identified needs with consideration for the public health and safety, whole-life cost, net zero carbon, culture, society and environment as required. (WK5)

Why choose Mathematics And Computing:
Conduct Investigations of Complex Problems: Conduct investigations of complex engineering problems using research-based knowledge including design of experiments, modelling, analysis & interpretation of data to provide valid conclusions. (WK8)

Mathematics And Computing is also known as:
 
btech

Campus Facility: The hostel provides the students with an atmosphere much like a home away from home.
Description: It provides them with all the necessary facilities, which help them to acclimatize well with this new ambience. Keeping in mind the different tastes of the students, the mess provides them with healthy and tasty food.
Source: https://niet.co.in/campus-facilities/about-hostel

Campus Facility: The hostel provides the students with an atmosphere much like a home away from home.
Description: Five hostels for boys and two for girls on the campus offer well-ventilated, comfortable rooms. Rooms are available on multi sharing basis. Library and internet facility is also provided to hostel students after college time. Medical facility is also provided to the students all the time. 24 hours RO water supply and power backup is available in hostel. Security guards are posted at the gate of hostels day and night.
